roleset.name: natural disaster: earthquake
roleset.note: SEISM-N NOTES: Added by Julia for earthquakes.

roles.note: The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.

example.name: seism-n
example.text: The report, from the National Research Council, states that the last major quake to hit the United States was the 7.8 magnitude seism in San Francisco in 1906
